page.title: 05SHOPS IN HARROLD
page.content: Shops in Harrold. There are four shops selling grocery and general requirements.Two of these shops are situated near The Green and we conducted surveys outside these two shops. In our survey we asked how often people shopped at that particular shop,whether they did all their shopping in the village or if they went to a nearby town <Bedford or Northampton>.Our results are as follows: Pax Stores:-A grocery shop which sells many kinds of general goods, sweets, cigarettes, etc. 2O people surveyed,6 shopped regularly once a week and the others "popped in"more than once a week for the odd things which they had forgotten to buy.
